text: The Son of Neptune is a 2011 fantasy-adventure book written by American author Rick Riordan in the series Heroes of Olympus. It is based on based on Greek and Roman mythology. It follows Percy Jackson after his memories have been erased. He meets Roman demigods Frank Zhang and Hazel Levesque and they start their adventure to defeat Gaea and save Hera. ==References== Category:2011 books Category:The Heroes of Olympus
title: The Son of Neptune
